turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: ... I found the goombah... Cavello. He's --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: -- I should tear your head off.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Whoa, I knew you were going to say that.  I absolutely anticipated that, Nick.  But I said to myself, Charlie, Charlie, we can move up on this, so go find Nicklaus... He'll be pissed for a moment, but then it'll dawn on him --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: -- Hey, I got a better chance of being hit by a bus then moving up.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Eating Scungilli, just like the last time you asked.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Who do you think the Jap is?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Maybe Cavello's buying a Subaru. How would I know?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I don't blame you for being sore. It'll pass when we bag him.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Charlie, don't do anything.  Promise me?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Charlie, take your gum, stick it under your ass and keep it warm.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: ... Nick, you're the one that's always saying you never go anywhere.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I was thinking the Poconos, Charlie. Maybe Vegas.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: What are you missing?  Riding your motorcycle to the nurse's house. That shit is sadder than Ethiopia.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Beats forty hours on a plane.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: They say we got to turn around and come right back.  That's what they say.  I got a plan.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I call, right?  I say I got the dreaded thirty six-hour Asian shits from some raw clam and we stretch it into three days.  You and I become a driving force on the local Geisha scene.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Hey, come on, big guy like you, cop from New York.  You're gonna be the biggest thing to hit town since Godzilla.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Where is the subway station, please.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Nick, have I been a good partner?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I just want you to know... I mean anybody who says you ever took has got to deal with me.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You didn't take, did you...?  You hear things.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I worked the three nine in Queens, Charlie.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: The lieutenant was on the pad along with the rest of the squad.  I was new, didn't know shit.  When the feathers flew, I got called in front of the special prosecutor.  It's on the top of my personnel file.  They think I'm dirty or I cut a deal. Doesn't leave you with a lot of friends either way.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Givin' you a book is like givin' a baby a gun.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: ... Detective Ich-iro Matsu-moto. Hey, we're getting Mr. Moto on our side.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You said that in the last two places.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I'd feel better if we had some heat.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's incredible.  Hit him or something.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I don't think he'd feel it.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: ... He's a sorry old guy, but I like him.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: He couldn't find his ass with both hands.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Now that's the kind of motorcycle I want to see you on.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Sure, a rice burning crotch rocket...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Nick, how we gonna bag this guy without any help?  Maybe I should work on that girl Joyce, she speaks the language.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: That I should let you pay for the drinks.  Kampai.

turns.speaker: CONNIE
turns.text: Yeah... I came to save you.  If you're hopeless, I'll pull the plug.

turns.speaker: CONNIE
turns.text: It's getting too cold even for me, Nick.

turns.speaker: CONNIE
turns.text: All right, how's the new partner?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Give me a break, would you?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Where do we start looking for this guy?

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: Where would you look for the mafia?

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: The mayor's office, under the bed, the back room at Lombardi's.  And call me Ich.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: "Goodness, gracious, great balls of fire."  To the killer.  Jerry Lee Lewis.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Jerry Lee Lewis, Elvis, Dinky Doo And The Don't's.  Let's book, Charlie.  If he starts on Motown, we'll be here all night.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: No, this is the place for the young Yakuza.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: That's what you said in the last three piss pots.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: ... We got to keep looking.  Track him down!  Great balls of fire!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Leave the rice cake outside and go home!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You know, Inspector, you take shit once, you take shit forever.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: They made you leave your hotel...  ... you caused a disturbance.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: It may be too soon to talk about it. When someone we care for dies we...  ... keep something of their's.  A tie, a pen.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Why weren't you at the platform?

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: I couldn't keep up.  My shame is complete.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: I'll get him for you, Nick.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: I've continued working on the case!

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: We can ask someone I used to work with.  A criminal.  Someone I pay money to...

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: He says they're very nice.  He wants to know if you have anymore.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: Nick, no one's seen Kobo in three days.  He might not even be in Tokyo.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Only one way to find out... Get her up in the morning and put her to bed at night.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: You said you could keep up with her! 'No problem, Nick-san.'

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: No.  Don't say anything.  Don't do anything, and for Christ's sake, don't apologize!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You're doing fine, Ich.  Now drop it, okay?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: If you're gonna give me a hard time, wait outside.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Four goddamn days.  This is going nowhere...

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: Broiled fish paste cake, Kelp roll, soybean curd, devils tongue --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Smells like Bayonne at low tide.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: You can't come in.  They don't want --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: If I smell one drop of Scotch on your breath, my friend --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: We're through.  I mean it.  This is the end of the line, Matsumoto.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: ... A Godfather.  His man was killed at the printing plant.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: Not without a small army, Nicklaus- san.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Ich, my name is Nick.  Not Nicklaus, not Nicklaus-san, not Nick-san. Nick.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: A few minutes faster, we might've nailed him.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I want to go talk to him.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Because he knows how to get to our man.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: He'll never speak to a Gaiijin.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's a new deal.  ... coming with me tomorrow?

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: Sugai's not going to be impressed with your gun, Nick.  No.  I won't put myself in danger for you anymore.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: For Sugai.  Caviar, French cheese, ham... If you come to apologize for interrupting his meeting, Sugai may feel obligated to see you.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's done.  You don't have to come.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Grab the keys, Ich, and get inside.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Not now, man, okay, not now.  Work with me.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: I called Ohashi, he'll be waiting.  I like him waiting.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I was ready to have your ass for taking off on me.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: I followed them.  An hour from the train station.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: We need the plate to negotiate with.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Now we've got nothing to negotiate with.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: You know, Nick, we can't lose.

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: Because we're the biggest things to hit this town since Godzilla.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Joyce, give the assistant Chief Inspector a drink, would you?

turns.speaker: ICH
turns.text: How can you be so sure?

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: He gets as much as he wants.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: There was a change in plans.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: An outside person.  A foreigner.  A barbarian.  You, me.  More you.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I could use some help.  Show me around.  I'll pay you for your time.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You can count on the truth from people who don't like you.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: You have a helluva way of asking for help.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You have a helluva way of answering.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: Look, you need Ich.  I've been here five years and I still can't read all the street signs.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: She ever pull down her shades?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Sure, but then I just pull out the photos.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You know where I can get a decent cup of coffee this time of night? I'm buying.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: Somebody must be suffering somewhere, you're being so nice.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: I've heard of Sugai.  I've also heard of the emperor.  They're both national treasures.  One's a hood.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I need someone to translate for me.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: My Japanese isn't that hot... Besides, you'll never get in.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's my last shot.  I have to be on a plane home tomorrow night.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: You're wrong to sell Ich short.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: I'd invite you up but I know you'd hate the incense.  I chant.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: 'Nam oyo ranged kyo.'  You think it's dumb of course.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Not if it works.  I'll meet you at the train?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I don't remember you saying no.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Who am I supposed to be?

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: This little guy thinks you're Robert Redford... the other one thinks you're Charles Bronson...

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: Bullshit, Nick.  And don't tell me this is all just about Charlie. It's not.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: I still think you're a bastard.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: Wouldn't help.  Watch out for Ich.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Can't make you change your mind?

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: Last time you asked me to come along I nearly got a hole in my head.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Might be different in New York.

turns.speaker: JOYCE
turns.text: Maybe.  If I come visit, we can find out.

turns.speaker: KOBO
turns.text: Ugly... A couple of thousand years they've been bound by these little rules.  Looking in.  Always afraid. Ugly little lives...

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Save it, I already took the tour.

turns.speaker: KOBO
turns.text: You are a lucky man.  Where you come from a man can stand out.  It's expected.  Here a man is made to look a fool for standing out.

turns.speaker: KOBO
turns.text: I like your friend, Joyce.  You're lucky.

turns.speaker: KOBO
turns.text: She's such a long way home for you.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Sugai won't give it to me, you know that.

turns.speaker: OLIVER
turns.text: How big a package we talking about?

turns.speaker: OLIVER
turns.text: The old man was a Japanese paper manufacturer.  Hotel room and rental car were full of it.

turns.speaker: OLIVER
turns.text: One guy do all the damage?

turns.speaker: OLIVER
turns.text: Thought you knew your way around dark alleys, detective.

turns.speaker: OLIVER
turns.text: Doesn't speak a word of English. And he won't speak Japanese either. No papers.  The Japanese embassy is very interested.

turns.speaker: OLIVER
turns.text: He's wanted in Japan.  They want him first.  Then we can have him.
